events.message: I am filing a claim for my car after a collision that occurred last night on Main Street. The rear bumper is badly damaged and the airbags deployed.
Your claim for the vehicle accident has been categorized under Auto Accident, ensuring correct processing priority and procedures.
An insurance agent, John Matthews, has been assigned to manage your car accident claim and will contact you shortly.
We have received your auto accident claim and are beginning processing. Thank you for submitting all preliminary details promptly.
Please provide a copy of the police accident report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and your driver's license to proceed.
All requested documents, including the police report and photos, have been submitted successfully for your vehicle accident claim.
Our claims investigation team has started reviewing evidence related to your car collision to verify liability and damages.
The investigation has concluded and verified the details of the accident, confirming coverage eligibility for your vehicle damages.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the damage assessment and policy terms, pending your review and acceptance.
We have received your feedback expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement and the communication from your claims agent.
Your auto accident claim has been approved and authorized for payment based on the agreed settlement amount.
The payment for your vehicle repair has been issued and should arrive in your bank account within 3 to 5 business days.
Your auto accident claim is now closed. We hope for your swift recovery and safe driving in the future.
